mapper.select: select seq, inquiry_type, title, content, write_date from inquiry_faq
mapper.insert: insert into inquiry_faq (inquiry_type, title, content, write_date) values (#{inquiry_type}, #{title}, #{content}, NOW())
mapper.select: select seq, inquiry_type, title, content, write_date from inquiry_faq where seq = #{seq}
select seq, theaterID, item_type, lost_date, title, status, user_id, guestID, content, fileID, view_cnt, write_date from inquiry_lost
mapper.insert: insert into inquiry_lost (theaterID, item_type, title, content, status, lost_date, user_id, write_date) values (#{theaterID}, #{item_type}, #{title}, #{content}, #{status}, #{lost_date}, #{user_id}, NOW())
mapper.select: select seq, theaterID, item_type, lost_date, title, status, user_id, guestID, content, fileID, view_cnt, write_date from inquiry_lost where seq = #{seq}

select seq, theaterID, item_type, lost_date, title, status, user_id, guestID, content, fileID, view_cnt, write_date from inquiry_lost where title LIKE concat ('%',#{keyword},'%') order by seq desc limit #{startnum}, #{postnum}
select seq, theaterID, inquiry_type, title, content, write_date, view_cnt, fileID, user_id from inquiry
mapper.insert: insert into inquiry (theaterID, inquiry_type, title, content, user_id, write_date,view_cnt) values (#{theaterID}, #{inquiry_type}, #{title}, #{content}, #{user_id}, NOW(),#{view_cnt})
mapper.update: update inquiry set view_cnt=view_cnt+1 where seq=#{seq}
mapper.select: select seq, theaterID, inquiry_type, title, content, write_date, view_cnt, user_id, fileID from inquiry where seq = #{seq}
